Package com.horaz.client.model

Class Summary
BaseModel Models represent the data in your app.
DataStore<T extends BaseModel> abstract datastore use any subclass
PersistentDataStore<T extends BaseModel> datastore that make the data persistent (html5 local storage).
SimpleDataStore<T extends BaseModel> simple datastore It stores the data only for the time of life.
 

Enum Summary
Validation predefined validation types
 

Exception Summary
ValidationException this exception is thrown when a validation failed.
